location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, on board H M S Bereniceto Commander Hillyer

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the need to await a telegram from Government (Bombay) regarding the proposal to send a steam transport to Muscat to remove British subjects from there.The letter also discusses Commander Hillyer's remarks to Government on Pellys decision not to have accompanied Highflyeron her attack of Damaum.
